title: Ka Lalpa hmu lo mah ila
lyrics:
Ka Lalpa hmu lo mah ila,
Ka hnenah a awm reng fo va;
A duhzawng thil ka tih laiin,
Lalpa fakin a aw ka hria.

A aw ka hria, Chhandamtu aw,
Ka rilruah lawmna min pe;
Eng lai pawhin min veng fo thin,
Lalpa fakin a aw ka hria.

A hmangaih haider mah ila,
Eng mahin a hliah thei ngai lo;
Khawvel sualna a phur zo ta,
Amah chu ring la, i nung ang.

Dik tak leh chiang takin min hrilh,
Ka hmaa chawlhna hmun nuam chu;
Chu hmun nuam chu ka thlen hunin,
Lalpa chu hlimin ka fak ang.
